title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - C-17 Globemaster - version 0.90
description:
A new beta version of the C-17 globemaster has been released today. The team of developers working on the aircraft have done a lot of work again. Besides Sim Update 7 compatibility the cockpit roof and walls did get painted but a feature which is really cool is the in-air reverse trust control which we will also use in this video.

If you want to try the aircraft yourself please download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/12408/msfs-native-c-17-globemaster
